text: The Man with the Gun () is a 1938 Soviet drama movie directed by Sergei Yutkevich.«Красный день календаря». 6 лучших фильмов об Октябрьской революцииЧеловек с ружьем (1938) It stars Maksim Shtraukh, Mikheil Gelovani, and Boris Tenin. == Actors == * Maksim Shtraukh as Vladimir Lenin *Mikheil Gelovani as Joseph Stalin (removed from cut version) *Boris Tenin as Ivan Shadrin * Vladimir Lukin as Nikolai Chibisov *Zoya Fyodorova as Katya == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1938 drama movies Category:1938 war movies Category:1930s historical movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Yutkevich Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Man with the Gun
